description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Dash your way across Beaches and Mountains as you attempt to maximize your high score!  Features two level themes, two player splitscreen, and online highscores.
description.short: Dash your way across Beaches and Mountains as you attempt to maximize your high score!  Features two level themes, two player splitscreen, and online highscores.
